xwikidoc.content: <jim^^> has joined #medsavant 11:11 <jim^^> has joined #medsavant 15:04 <meatcar_> jim^^: in our sql queries, we reference users with this format "<username>@'localhost'". For example, here: https://github.com/compbio-UofT/medsavant/blob/a424861dd726a5792cf9e206d61e5a804ab076f9/MedSavantServerEngine/src/main/java/org/ut/biolab/medsavant/server/serverapi/UserManager.java#L466 15:04 <meatcar> has joined #medsavant 15:04 <meatcar> do you know why exactly we do so? It seems like I can still reference users, even if I ommit the @'localhost' bit 20:13 <jim^^> has joined #medsavant 20:33 <jim^^> has joined #medsavant
